name: 雷电1942-单机打飞机游戏
description:
Destroy the enemy planes and escape from rival firepower! Really a challenge huh?! Not to mention the super BOSS planes!
Raiden Fighter is a classical air combat game!
You can enjoy the super fun of this top air battle game with its flowing control, splendid special effects, powerful BGM, delicate aircrafts and challenging levels!

How To:
Classic screen-touch mode, just tap and slide to control.
Smash down the enemy planes and gain high scores in your journey!
The highest record will be saved in the game. Come on and have a try!

Features:
Super amazing aircrafts
Multiple challenging levels
Exciting powerful weapons: flame shotgun, laser bombs, laser beam
Upgrade the aircrafts to strengthen their attack and defense power
Unique survival mode! Just enjoy the super fun and get high NOW!!!
